messages.title: This Election is your chance to STOP BREXIT and BUILD A BRIGHTER FUTURE for Reading West
messages.content: Meri O'Connell and the Liberal Democrats working in Reading West all year round. Local teacher Meri O'Connell is standing for the Liberal Democrats, to be our next Member of Parliament for Reading West.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stopping Brexit is the first step to restoring our fortune, healing the national divisions and taking back control of our future.

issues.brexitEurope: Meri O'Connell and the Liberal Democrats believe that stopping the damage Brexit could do to our hospitals, our jobs, our schools is the start of building a brighter future for our children.
issues.education: Meri O’Connell lives and works locally. She teaches at a local comprehensive, is a parent and a three-time councilor. A vote for Meri is a vote for a proven local champion.

leaflet.personalStatement: Local teacher Meri O'Connell is standing for the Liberal Democrats, to be our next Member of Parliament for Reading West. The Lib Dems have shown they will work across party divides to bring you greener, fairer solutions, helping fix the system for everyone. Voting Lib Dem is voting for a party that don't stop until they get work fairer for everyone.

images.caption: Meri O'Connell and her supporters promoting 'Stop Brexit'

leaflet.additionalNotes: Support for the Lib Dems continues to grow after they beat both Labour and the Conservatives nationally, in the European Elections in May. Recent polls show support for the Liberal Democrats is at record levels, and Jo Swinson is the most popular party leader. MPs and members from both Labour and the Conservatives are joining the Lib Dems, including local Berkshire MP Dr Phillip Lee, and ex-Labour frontbencher Chuka Umunna.
